name: Adventure Time: Pirates of the Enchiridion
description: Ahoy! The Land of Ooo is underwater and it’s up to Finn and Jake to find out why. Join our heroes as they explore the high seas, search for hidden clues, interrogate shady suspects and fight pirates to solve the mystery and save their waterlogged world!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 430 (1024 MB)/ Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i5, 4 x 2.6 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Windows Vista and DirectX® 9.0b and below not supported
